channel.title: 1.7.1.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in 1.7.1.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.2.1
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.2.1 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 25 issues reported on version 1.7.2.

item.title: 6 months of PrestaShop
item.description: July is almost over and more than 6 months have come and gone since the beginning of the year. Time to gather some numbers and make sense of them. Infographic included!

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.1.2
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.1.2 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 28 issues reported on version 1.7.1.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.1.1
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.1.1 is now available. This maintenance release closes more than 20 of the most pressing issues reported since v1.7.1.0.

item.title: What's new regarding translations in PrestaShop 1.7.1.0
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.1.0 has been shipped with several new features to improve internationalization and localization. Here is a short tour of what’s new and how it makes things better for you, both as a merchant and a translator!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.1.0 is available!
item.description: Many of you have been waiting for it: PrestaShop 1.7.1.0 is now available, and it is all you’ve ever wanted v1.7 to be!

item.title: Test the updated 1-Click Upgrade module!
item.description: After much work and hair-pulling, we finally did it: the 1-Click Upgrade module supports upgrading from 1.6 to 1.7.1.0. Are you ready to test it before the release?
